title: Blinkit to Expand Dark Store by 40 pc over Next 1 yr - Indian Retailer
summary: Blinkit plans to expand its micro-fulfillment centers, focusing on increasing store count by up to 40% in the next 12 months. The company experienced growth without expanding its dark store footprint, with revenue up 28% QoQ. Blinkit expects advertisement revenue to boost revenue per order, introducing a self-serve advertising platform for brands.
